Chris,
 
There is a feature request in SourceForge for this but no concrete plan. My
personal opinion is that categories are best handled in the IDE, but many
people prefer to express the categories in the source code.
 
Sincerely yours,
 
Kent Beck
Three Rivers Institute


  _____

Chen

To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] tag via annotation




Is there a plan to add this in JUnit? thx!

> Hi,
> 
> The ability to tag test cases with key words and
> allow

> words would be very useful in our organization. we
> are thinking about doing this using annotation.
> 
> Any suggestions/thoughts?
> 
> Thanks in advance!
